trans-unit.source: Azure Mobile Engagement iOS SDK Release Notes
trans-unit.target: Azure Mobile Engagement iOS SDK Release Notes

trans-unit.source: Latest updates and procedures for iOS SDK for Azure Mobile Engagement
trans-unit.target: Latest updates and procedures for iOS SDK for Azure Mobile Engagement

trans-unit.source: Release notes
trans-unit.target: Release notes

trans-unit.source: Fix iOS 9 compatibility bug with a third party library.
trans-unit.target: Fix iOS 9 compatibility bug with a third party library.

trans-unit.source: It was causing crashes while sending polls results, application information or extra data.
trans-unit.target: It was causing crashes while sending polls results, application information or extra data.

trans-unit.source: Mobile Engagement uses Silent Push Notifications.
trans-unit.target: Mobile Engagement uses Silent Push Notifications.

trans-unit.source: Dropped support for iOS 4.X.
trans-unit.target: Dropped support for iOS 4.X.

trans-unit.source: Starting from this version the deployment target of your application must be at least iOS 6.
trans-unit.target: Starting from this version the deployment target of your application must be at least iOS 6.

trans-unit.source: The Mobile Engagement device id for devices < iOS 6 is now based on a GUID generated at installation time.
trans-unit.target: The Mobile Engagement device id for devices < iOS 6 is now based on a GUID generated at installation time.

trans-unit.source: Added Swift compatibility.
trans-unit.target: Added Swift compatibility.

trans-unit.source: When clicking on a notification, the action URL is now executed right after the application is opened.
trans-unit.target: When clicking on a notification, the action URL is now executed right after the application is opened.

trans-unit.source: Added missing header file in SDK package.
trans-unit.target: Added missing header file in SDK package.

trans-unit.source: Fixed an issue when the Mobile Engagement crash reporter was disabled.
trans-unit.target: Fixed an issue when the Mobile Engagement crash reporter was disabled.

trans-unit.source: Initial Release of Azure Mobile Engagement
trans-unit.target: Initial Release of Azure Mobile Engagement

trans-unit.source: appId/sdkKey configuration is replaced by a connection string configuration.
trans-unit.target: appId/sdkKey configuration is replaced by a connection string configuration.

trans-unit.source: Removed API to send and receive arbitrary XMPP messages from arbitrary XMPP entities.
trans-unit.target: Removed API to send and receive arbitrary XMPP messages from arbitrary XMPP entities.

trans-unit.source: Removed API to send and receive messages between devices.
trans-unit.target: Removed API to send and receive messages between devices.

trans-unit.source: Security improvements.
trans-unit.target: Security improvements.

trans-unit.source: SmartAd tracking removed.
trans-unit.target: SmartAd tracking removed.

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
